name: Kristian Torp
content: Kristian Torp Welcome My name is Kristian Torp , I am an associate professor at Aalborg University. I am with the Department of Computer Science where I work in the Daisy, that is part of the Database, Programming, and Web Technologies group. My research interests include the following. Spatio-temporal data management and analytics Traffic Analytics Efficiently handling of very large data sets Research I am involved in a number of research projects related to moving objects, traffic, and large data sets. For a list see Current research projects Awards 2018 IEEE Workshop Big Spatial Data, Best Paper Award 2018 ACM SIGSPATIAL, Best Demo Award 2015 ACM SIGSPATIAL, Best Paper Award 2014 ACM SIGSPATIAL, Best Short Paper 2013 MDM, Best Demo Award 2012 ACM IWGS@SIGSPATIAL, Best Paper Award Teaching My teaching is related to data management and programming.
